member.name: T:AGI.STKesriDisplay.AgEsri3dRenderer
member.summary: STK 3D GIS renderer.

member.name: M:AGI.STKesriDisplay.AgEsri3dRenderer.OpenMapDocument(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Opens the specified MapDocument in preparation for reading it.

member.name: M:AGI.STKesriDisplay.AgEsri3dRenderer.CloseMapDocument(AGI.STKesriDisplay.AgESTKesriCallOptions)
member.summary: Closes the map document.

member.name: M:AGI.STKesriDisplay.AgEsri3dRenderer.Refresh(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Refreshes the GIS display. If SelectionOnly is specified, only the selected features are re-redendered.

member.name: M:AGI.STKesriDisplay.AgEsri3dRenderer.Pause
member.summary: Pause the GIS data rendering. If the view changes, the GIS data will not redraw.

member.name: M:AGI.STKesriDisplay.AgEsri3dRenderer.Resume
member.summary: Resume the GIS data rendering. The GIS display will be updated when the view changes.

member.summary: Zoom to a specific layer.
